entry.text:
Did you apply the following suggestions?
RecoveryEngine : full solution MetaAgent name : netdis01_env RecoveryAction : RECOVERY_ENV_ON (29) Problem : The server "netdis01" (address : netdis01) seems to be down Solution : Turn it on again. Command : ipmitool <ipmiUser> -I lan -H <ipmiAddress> -P <ipmiPass> chassis power on (Alternatively, you could also go to press the button...)

RecoveryEngine : full solution MetaAgent name : netdis01_env RecoveryAction : RECOVERY_ENV_ON (29) Problem : The server "netdis01" (address : netdis01) seems to be down Solution : Turn it on again. Command : ipmitool <ipmiUser> -I lan -H <ipmiAddress> -P <ipmiPass> chassis power on (Alternatively, you could also go to press the button...)

MetaAgent name : netdis01_env RecoveryAction : RECOVERY_ENV_ON (29) Problem : The server "netdis01" (address : netdis01) seems to be down Solution : Turn it on again. Command : ipmitool <ipmiUser> -I lan -H <ipmiAddress> -P <ipmiPass> chassis power on (Alternatively, you could also go to press the button...)
RecoveryEngine : the required recovery steps for the faulty agents are the following
The possibly impacted Coordinators are : Icinga Icinga
We have diagnosed an environment problem on netdis01
Impacted by the environment problem : Icinga
We have diagnosed a problem on Icinga. The problem comes from netdis01_env
Setting it as responsible (Cause : Nan -> Server not pingable)
Coordinator Icinga : the child Nan seems to have a problem.
Setting it as responsible (Cause : Server not pingable)
Coordinator Nan : the child Abstract_nanConf_Nan seems to have a problem.
